articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Bystander shown in videos disarming gunman during Australian beach shooting commended for bravery - Politico
articles.description: Ahmed al Ahmed, 43, ran toward the gunfire when the shooting started on Bondi Beach. He was shot twice.
articles.content: A man walking up to a gunman who had fired on the community and single-handedly disarming him, putting his own life at risk to save the lives of countless other people, Minns said. That man is a genu… [+1179 chars]
